details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.6.2.3 Schemas - Extension schema Field type - description field
details.description: Field 'description' of the PDF/A Field value type in the PDF/A extension schema shall have type Text and namespace prefix 'pdfaField'.

rule.description: Field 'description' of the PDF/A Field value type in the PDF/A extension schema shall have type Text and namespace prefix 'pdfaField'.

error.message: Field 'description' of the PDF/A Field value type is not present, or doesn't have prefix 'pdfaField' (description prefix = %1) or doesn't have type Text (isDescriptionValidText = %2)
